meanings.sent1: Botanising is a fun way to learn about different types of plants.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy botanising in the garden to identify new flowers.
meanings.sent3: The botanising class went on a field trip to explore the local flora.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for botanising bloomed like a beautiful flower.
meanings.sent5: The botanising activity opened my eyes to the wonders of nature.

meanings.definition: To search for or collect plants for study.
meanings.sent1: We will be botanising in the forest to find rare species.
meanings.sent2: She loves botanising in the wild to add to her plant collection.
meanings.sent3: The botanising expedition turned into a plant treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to botanising was like searching for hidden gems.
meanings.sent5: Botanising allows us to discover the beauty of the plant world.

meanings.definition: To engage in the scientific study of plants.
meanings.sent1: Scientists spend hours botanising to understand plant life better.
meanings.sent2: Botanising is essential for researchers to make new plant discoveries.
meanings.sent3: The botanising experiment led to an unexpected breakthrough.
meanings.sent4: She approached botanising with the precision of a skilled detective.
meanings.sent5: The art of botanising reveals the intricate details of plant biology.
